jobsJson.text: Transaction Ops Manager, Financial Services Platform
jobsJson.descriptionPlain: Transaction Ops leader is a shared function who bridging the credit ops with finance division. TO Leader will prepare many report templates to support finance team for documenting every disbursement and repayment transaction of each products.  TO Leader also responsible for documentation, monitoring, reports, and analysing the transaction flows whether it goes well or not. he/she will provide financial data for any complaints and lead some automation projects.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Collaborates with Share service head to meet all targets for the function/s as set by the teamReviews and Manages reportorial requirements, completion status and SLA tracking
  • Maximizes team efficiency by creating and implementing daily, monthly, quarterly and yearly work tasks/plans aligned with project initiatives and goals function
  • Participate in brainstorming sessions to improve Knowledge Management/Communication Tool, communications process, customer satisfaction, agent processes and agent effectiveness
  • Receive requests from internal and external clients for processing financial transactions
  • Participate in decision making for new product launchUpdate all changes to products and services, rules and regulations to ensure accurate processing of documents and perform accurate quality assurance checks
  • Review and consolidates escalated team issues that remain unaddressed (e.g customer complaints) for escalation to the share service head and/or to the Internal Unit Lead / Partnership as appropriate Create/review all SOP for transaction ops
  • Review all reconciliation report
  • Collaborate with platform, finance and BI team for automation project
  • Create a report template for new product launches, which will be used to help the finance team in reporting purpose

• 4 or more years Banking/Financial services industry
  • Data accuracy and attention to detail are key for this role
  • Previous experience in transaction processing or auditing is a plus
  • Must be comfortable with MS Suites, computers and learning new software
  • Excellent ability to type accurately is requiredStrong analytical and communication skills
  • Can work under pressure
